verses.name: Deuteronomy 15:19
verses.text: All the firstling males that come of thy herd and of thy flock thou shalt sanctify unto the Lord thy God: thou shalt do no work with the firstling of thy bullock, nor shear the firstling of thy sheep.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 15:20
verses.text: Thou shalt eat it before the Lord thy God year by year in the place which the Lord shall choose, thou and thy household.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 15:21
verses.text: And if there be any blemish therein, as if it be lame, or blind, or have any ill blemish, thou shalt not sacrifice it unto the Lord thy God.
